name: Workshops and Webinars
short_description: We regularly develop and offer new workshops and webinars that focus on particular departments.
event_description: Join our one-day workshop to dive into the world of web development. This hands-on session covers HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics. No prior coding experience required.

name: Career Fair in Technology
short_description: Connect with top tech companies and explore career opportunities.
event_description: Explore career opportunities in the technology industry. Meet representatives from leading tech companies, attend informational sessions, and submit your resume directly to employers.

name: Educational Conference on AI
short_description: Stay updated on the latest trends in Artificial Intelligence.
event_description: Join experts and professionals in the field of Artificial Intelligence for a comprehensive conference. Explore AI applications, industry trends, and network with like-minded individuals.

name: Language Learning Events
short_description: Include events related to language learning workshops, speaking clubs, and language immersion programs.
eventName: Language Exchange and Cultural Immersion Workshop
event_description: Embark on a linguistic journey with our Language Learning Events. Explore diverse cultures and broaden your horizons as you delve into the intricacies of language acquisition. Our events provide immersive experiences, language exchange opportunities, and engaging activities to make language learning both enjoyable and effective.

name: Leadership Development Programs
short_description: Provide a platform for leadership and executive training programs.
event_description: Unlock your leadership potential with our Leadership Development Programs. Tailored for professionals at every career stage, these programs delve into strategic leadership, effective communication, and team management.

name: Hackathons and Coding Bootcamps
short_description: Include events focused on hands-on coding challenges and intensive programming bootcamps.
event_description: Immerse yourself in the dynamic world of technology with our Hackathons and Coding Bootcamps. These intensive programs offer hands-on experience, allowing participants to tackle real-world challenges, collaborate with like-minded individuals, and enhance their coding skills.
